评论概述: Bad seller - pants seemed like seconds
评论详情: I have a pair of Britt Utility’s in grey. I ordered these, same size, color, and name. The ones I received had missed stitching and incorrect stitching colors. The crotch to waistline was nearly 2” longer than my old pair, and the new pair had an odd seam that made the hips poof out. So disappointed. Don’t buy from this seller.
The legs are at least an inch shower then labeled. When I work in then I have to wear them lower on my posterior so the legs meets up with my boots. Rugged and haven't faded yet though.

I wear size 8, ordered size 10 in these.  They are still too tight and seem to be shaped more for men.  They are now my “goal pants” because I really want to be able to wear them when riding my motorcycle.
Bought an inseam of 28, they are a 32! Way too long for me!
Love these, the canvas is great, craftsmanship well done, made by women for women. Pricey but.

I'm a 6ft lady, 36" from crotch to the floor. These pants are great. They're sturdy and I love the pockets. They're a little loose around the waist but fit great everywhere else, nothing a good belt can't fix.

They run a size smaller than my normal size. Read the wash instructions carefully. I absent mindedly threw them in with my other jeans and they shrank. It wasn't a whole lot but due to the thickness of the denim the waist got tighter, I can still wear them but they are not as comfortable as they were before hand. Its my fault, I did read the instructions and forgot. Later I bought the kaki overalls and went up another size incase I made the mistake again (which I did) and now they fit well. If your like me and forget to separate your laundry, go up another size.
Really like the cut and fit was decent but a bit loose in the waist. Which is why it makes no sense for the riveted button closure to rip loose after 3 wears.

评论概述: Everything I had hoped for and more!
评论详情: High quality fabric, heavily reinforced with lots of pockets, very flattering fit!

I was really looking forward to these, i ordered using the size chart provided and they were way to small. So i ordered again this time 2 sizes over, based on the measurements these should have been baggy, i didn't even meet the minimum measurements. Still way to small! And extremely low rise. I am a hard working curvy woman, baby got back. And i really would love some utility pants that aren't made for men,( straight, low rise, run small) super disappinted

评论概述: Well built, but the waist is too tight.
评论详情: I love this brand and was excited to get my first pair to wear for work, but returned after trying on. Roomy until you have to button it. The waist is disproportionately smaller for the hip size.

I tried another pair of dovetail workpants and they sat lower on the hips.  These are the perfect rise for my body, so comfortable!  So many great pockets, great materials, cute design for work pants!  I love these!
I love these pants for work. They are loose to start and shrink over time but by then I’ve worn them out.

Horrible Product/Pants First pair of purchase of Dovetail pants and my last!!! These are the worst pair of pants I have ever bought! First off they ripped within 2 weeks of purchasing them for $89!!! And now I find that the “zip pocket” has a hole all the way down through the knee patch area and anything in the “zip” pocket can fall out onto the ground without you knowing! I have lost a necklace because of this! I am so upset I can’t even say!!! NEVER will I EVER buy a pair of Dovetail pants again! And they have done little to address the issue with these pants.

I love Dovetail work pants. But I do not know what happened with the pair I received. I would have returned them had I not noticed this sooner. The cut is way off! Since they’re work pants for me and the front is usually covered by my jacket it’s fine for now. It’s just disappointing for how expensive these pants are.

I bought these pants for work, I am a Chef and all these extra little pockets really come in handy. Not to mention I go through pants very quickly and the material on these is very sturdy, they are very well made! These pants were EXTREMELY comfortable, loved the material and the way they fit. I have a big bottom so I often struggle with finding pants that fit, I’m short at 5ft and 160 pounds. Unfortunately they were a little big on me and so I returned them. I started to order a different size but the more I thought about the price on these I realized that I really needed to buy at least 5 pairs of new work pants soon and I just couldn’t justify to spend nearly $500 on work pants alone so maybe when I get a bonus I’ll come back and buy a couple pairs. I really loved them so if you are looking for comfort and a great fit, definitely choose these!!! They are worth the price if you can afford it!

Love the pants! First pair of women’s work pants I actually liked. They sat right at my belly button so a little higher rise than most women work pants. I got my normal size but could have gone down a size & maybe a long. Normal length is right at the boot or ankle on me.

For the price, I really wanted to be disappointed in this product. I can not tell you how.....thoroughly how amazing these damn things feel. I'm a shortie and the regular length is perfect. No more shuffling pant legs against the ground. I was getting used to wearing the wranglers menfolk pants, they were comfy like PJs but lasted a month with what I do. These! OMG THESE! Blow every pair of pants I've ever worn out the water. I hate that I love these so much! But will slowly fill my wardrobe because I don't want to take them off! Great material, heavy fabric yet I feel like I'm wearing nothing at all!

I had already the Maven Slim in black denim and No fade black. I wanted a straight pants as well. I really love it, these ones fit over my work boots.  The same size fits me in the different models. In Levi’s I have w28 l28, here I have 8 short (28).  Really hope you keep delivering to Europe. Because I also want to try the denim one, but it’s always out of stock in my size.

评论概述: Strange fit on these extra long pants..
评论详情: Some manufacturers seem to believe that longer inseam also means a longer rise. I purchased a 10XL, and they can be described as super high waisted, not midrise as advertised. Strangely, the waist doesn't taper like a normal woman's style, I could fit a whole cat in there and carry it around comfortably. And the thighs are very tight, and I don't have super thick thighs. I'm adding a pic wearing normal 10XL pants for comparison. Disappointed because the overall design, fabric, and craftsmanship seemed to be high quality, but the cut is all wrong.

I ordered my first pair of these just over a year ago and they were perfect, I should have bought another back up pair but I didn’t. I work a very physical job and clothing and boots do not last long. It was finally time to say goodbye to my old pair so I bought the same exact pair, same seller, same size. 2/32. They are HUGE. They are labeled 2/32 but I am swimming in them where as my other pair fit perfectly. The material is also a much darker color and I’m just super disappointed that they don’t fit as they should. I live 2.5 hours away from the closest Amazon return location and unfortunately had to wear them to work because I had nothing else. Why does the same brand and same size CHANGE!? I am so frustrated. Besides that they are comfortable and I was very happy with Dovetail but now I’m just not sure.

So! I stepped in a yellow jacket nest today at work while wearing these. The upper half of my body? Wrecked. The lower half though? Pristine. These pants do it all- I bobbed, I wove, I sprinted, I fell through a thicket (and still looked good as hell). I’ll take a few more pairs, please!

I bought them 2 sizes larger than I wear wrangler jeans and I couldn’t even pull them up my legs completely, forget zip them up. The proportions were nice and seemed like they’d feel great if they were the right size but good grief are they small. Everyone is proportioned differently and brands have their own sizing but it’s been a long while since I bought pants 2 sizes larger only to find them still 2+ sizes small. At that point, just label their waist and length measurements and quit using a numerical size.

评论概述: I love Dovetail, but these aren’t it.
评论详情: This is my 4th pair of Dovetail pants. And I generally love them. I wore through my previous pair, and I immediately went to replace them. They were out of stock for the original indigo denim, after speaking to a customer service agent I was told they would fit the same, but have a bit more stretch, and a thinner hand feel/ but a similar weight.  These have a fit that are way tighter, feel significantly thinner, and even if they do stretch, it seems like they need to be worn down a catwalk, not to a worksite. I’m using them for city clothes now, but they aren’t serving their purpose as work pants this go round, which is unfortunate because the price is steep.  If you’re used to wearing Dovetail I’d suggest you size up from your normal measurements and maybe consider a different material.
Worked out great for me. Exact right fit. I guess I COULD have gone up one inch on the length, but it's not really a big deal. Would buy again
Good quality pants but a 32” inseam is not “long”
I bought two pair of Dovetail pants for work. They fit great, move great and feel great while I’m wearing them.
Bigger than expected

I purchased these through a company managed clothing account and they are the very best pair of work pants I've ever had. Not only are they comfortable and good looking, but also highly functional. A lot (if not all other brands) sacrifice one for the other. I love the tool loop, pockets that you can actually put things in, and even other utilities that I hadn't thought to use (clip pocket).  I 100% recommend these pants. Perfect!
They shrink when you wash them!!

I even went a size up from my normal size because a few reviews said they run small. At least two sizes small. I'm frustrated trying to find a company who actually has clothes that fit plus size women. As that was the biggest size they offer I have no options but to return them. The quality of the pants are great- but sizing runs quite small.

评论概述: need to return for sizing- doesn't fit like the black dovetails
评论详情: Doesn't fit like the other dovetails-way too small-no instructions for returns

I was looking for workwear more durable than similar brands of workwear. I had high hopes for these especially at this price. But they wear out in the oddest places in a short period of time. These wore out in the button hole which will eventually render them useless and after only a couple of months. The other pair i bought the zipper wont stay up, also useless. I wont buy again at this rate. Disclaimer: i didn't buy these on amazon but at a local boutique. However, just trying to save someone else some money. Cheers!

Studying with the size chart is a challenge, stay the course they are worth it. But return until you find your size you won't regret it. They have a lot of stretch so my 10 I can only wear once then I have to wash dry again. Next time I'll get an 8.

评论概述: The best work pants I have ever bought
评论详情: I like the different pairs of pants different material I can't wait to buy the others
These pants hold everything I need to carry with me, and fit comfortably, all while looking great!
These last a long time through tough conditions. Can be a bit stiff if you are not use to heavy duty. Buy a size up if you are use to something stretchy.

After wearing and washing for a few months they seem to be holding up well in regards to durability. However they aren't as flexible as other jeans I've owned and they're a bit too snug in the thighs and not shaped for women who have a smaller waist, wider hips and thicker thighs.

评论概述: Once you gusset, you won't go back.
评论详情: These. Are. The. Best. Pants. Ever.
I love them! great material, cool style, very comfortable

Had a girlfriend that told me about the jeans. I was kinda hesitant on the price but you get what you pay for. I absolutely love them. They fit as expected! I’m so in love with them and they’re great for work. I got a 27 waist /30 length
Trash yep that's were they are going after 3 months of minimum wear. Worst pants ever and huge waste of money Only thing worse is customer service

The original size I ordered was a tad small int he waist and a tad too short. It might be good to go for the longer inseam right off the bat if you dont want them to be high waters. Otherwise these pants are AMAZING- very well thought out and definitely made for the female form. They have pockets galore, double reinforced knees, and JUST enough stretch to make them comfortable all day long. I was very skeptical, but have been truly impressed. In fact I ordered another pair in blue
I would wear these every single day if I could. Super cute, the most perfect fit, and very functional! Everything you could ever need or want in a work pant.

评论概述: Great work pants! Wish the material was heavier . Sizing can be confusing.
评论详情: I love these pants, no pants have ever fit more perfect and are comfortable to work in.  I usually ruin clothing and put holes in the knees. I need to buy the knee inserts but still I’m concerned with the weight of the denim. They’re not super thin, but they’re not heavy denim. They stretch a little bc of this and are more forgiving. I have to see how long they last before I can really tell if they are a good work pant. I had to exchange the first pair as I got a 6, but the 4/30 worked best for me.
it is stylish and functional

Carhartt’s women’s pants just don’t fit right where I need them to so I usually wear men’s Carhartt’s. These are great for women! They’re super comfortable, have LOTS of pockets (thank the LAWD) & are over all great! Little more expensive than my men’s pants but these are fantastic. Finally somebody that understands a working woman’s needs!

I'm not big on reviews but I just had to! When first trying on they seemed a bit tight on my hips but ok every where else. I have them a try and wore them to work today.. (I dont ever pay this much for work pants) after trying then on all day I love them... the stretched at the waist I guess because they are fine now. I'm an hvac technician, craw spaces, bending over, hot attics.. I love how they fit me love how they feel. They may be thick meterial but even sitying in attics they didnt bother me one bit, very comfortable. I got what I paid for and will be buying more.

I wouldn’t mind if they weren’t quite as high rise as they are but I’m partial to low rise anyways. That being said I finally found a pair of work pants I love! They’re durable, well made, pockets are the perfect size and amount and they fit nicely. I’m between a size 2 and 4 and got a size 4. They get softer after each wash and after reading other reviews I haven’t been putting them in the dryer to keep them from shrinking. I fully expected this to be another pair of work pants that I tried on and returned because it was either cutesy and not functional or functional but looked absolutely ridiculous but instead I ended up ordering a second pair.

I am 5'8", 160 lbs. Bottom heavy and long torso. I purchased the 32W/34L black canvas stretch pair. I was expecting an 8 or a 10 tall basically. What came said a 6/34. They were almost too small to get on, but I did. The stretch helps and they are super cute. Glad they're not too baggy. I'm expecting to lose a little weight, so I guess alls well that ends well. Very glad I got the longer length too. Was afraid I might get a pair I'd trip over. Very satisfied and expect they will get more comfy as they are worn and washed a few times. I don't think they'll shrink to become unwearable. Love all the pockets. Durable bottom hem. Update: got the green ripstop. Love. Ordered size up. What came was a 14/34. See added photos) Comfy fit. Flattering and functional. Love the style. Strange range in sizing, but very satisfied overall. I think I ordered the last pairs. I hope they keep selling this brand and quality pants. 💖

I ordered several sizes and settled on the smallest one.  27” 34”.  My measurements are 30” low waist, 36”-37” hip, 22.5” thighs and I’m 5’8”.  If I followed the size chart then the 28” would work.  They were good, but I could tell they would stretch out and be too loose in the waist like the other reviewers have written.  They are similar to jeans in that they stretch to fit your shape.  I usually have that waist gapping issue and do not with these.

评论概述: Ordered 28L, the inseam is actually 26 on the 28L
评论详情: Liked the canvas fabric, it felt sturdy. Disliked the fact that I order a 28L, which would have been the perfect length, tried them on and they're too short. I measured the inseam and even though the label on the pants is 28, the inseam is 26. Also the waist is loose, butt is tight, legs fit good. It's cotton so I figured the butt area would stretch out and I'll just wear a belt. I'm 5'2", 110-115lbs, athletic shape 25" waist 34" hips (I have a booty, which these pants apparently do not accommodate well) I'm ordering the 26x30 and hoping the length is right on those

I work in a metal cnc machining shop.  I was wearing regular jeans.  I used to end up with metal chips embedded in my pants and it was uncomfortable.  I have yet to have this happen in my dovetails.  I bought a pair of dovetails and a pair of carhartt at the same time.  There is no comparison even though the Carhartt were almost the same price.  These are strong durable pants with deep pockets.  They fit so well that I wish they made regular jeans.  I feel confident and ready for work in these.  I weigh 133 lbs and I am 5'4" I bought a 8×32.

评论概述: Not for anybody with a booty
评论详情: I build things, my husband and I process wood for a side gig (like chop down trees, haul them out, split them, stack it), and I'm a farm girl.  I need pants that don't get in the way and that I don't care about trashing.  These felt less substantial than my carhartts or old wranglers and I could barely get them over my hips.  I'm a flat chested hourglass, measurements 38-31-41, and while the waist on these was a little more forgiving, I couldn't buck a bale in them because the thighs and butt are so tight.  They also weren't particularly flattering - I was hoping that workpants made for women would fit a little better, but my butt looks better in a old pair of my husband's Levi 501s.  Really wanted to like them, but sent em back and I'll look hard elsewhere before I try anything else from Dovetail.

That's right. Been working in these all day and it's like I'm wearing nothing due to the lack of seam in the crotch and the flexibility of the fabric. I usually get home and can't wait to take off my pants as they are stiff and heavy. These have been on all day and into dinner. My only complaint is that I'd like to see the back of the pant come up a little higher so that when I squat, I don't have plumbers crack. These are a mid-rise pant which I love, but the back could be higher.  The fabric is super flexible and didn't seem to stretch out from morning to night. Most stretch pants do end up stretching out. Time will tell with how these will hold up on the stretch.  Tons of pockets. So many that I misplace my items. I like a side utility pocket, as that's where I put my phone. This side utility pocket is located to the back of the seam which puts my phone under my leg when I sit. I'm not too happy about that but it is comfortable when standing and I would like that pocket to be a little longer.  Love the articulated knees and the reinforced cuff as well as the ability to choose both the size and length of the pant.  I wear a 10 x 28 and they fit like they were tailor made.  I highly recommend these to anyone needing an ultra comfortable light duty work pant. The fabric is lighter than canvas but stronger than nylon.

评论概述: I believe these are seconds. There's a cut on these jeans. Poor quality control!!
评论详情: I always wash clothes before I wear them. I got these but then went out of town. I returned last week, washed them so I could wear them, and saw a cut on the pocket area. It's an actual cut, like a knife or scissors. I'm a few days past the very limited return window. Now I'm stuck with damaged jeans!!  They are expensive and I'd expect better quality control.  I'd give 0 stars but that's not an option.
Good fit. Very durable. Withstood goats and pigs chewing on them. Wouldn't say that there's 11 functional pockets. It's just me but tiny pockets within a pocket don't count as functional.

I’m not in the trades but I love the style and functionality of these pants. Material is robust, high quality and well tailored. For me they fit my active lifestyle. I’m wearing them all the time. Haven’t been out for a hike in them b/c yet b/c I sweat a lot and like a fabric that would wick the sweat. But I’ll give them a try sometime and see how they do. The gusset crotch and articulated, reinforced knees should make them quite suitable for hiking. Im betting these will last forever and look great as they age. Would love to also see these in a nice tough sweat wicking tech fabric!

Pants are a tad stiff when I first got them, but they seem durable. I do recommend sizing up. I generally wear a sz 10 (AE) & I decided to go with a size 12 x30. They fit, bit slightly snug in the waist I’m 5’6” 175lbs. They do sit a little higher than regular jeans. I do love the amount of pockets & they seem extremely rugged. I’ll be using these for welding. Will update with how they do in that trade as I continue wearing.

When that "other well known brand" quit making the women's1889 I was gutted as those worked just great. Then I recently came across Dovetail, and the Britney seemed very comparable so I gave them a try. I was truly impressed. They fit really nicely with room to flex and not too wide for a slim leg, have pockets in all the right places and plenty of them, and the material is hard-wearing canvas. I tend to wear these all year round on the ranch no matter the task and can get a thin base-layer underneath too. I think I'm a convert! About the same price as the 1889's too, so all round a great product! I bought the size 4 in long, and am 130lb and 5'6". They go nicely over work/hunting boots.
Quality of material
High quality product that going to last for years. All the pockets make them  so funtional. I'll be using for working around the house and for lesure.

评论概述: Pants fit great. I’m 1m60cm (5&3/4?) and weigh 140.
评论详情: I’m of average athletic build with a little pear shape combination. The pant length is perfect and everything else too. This is a first for me. It’s for work but I like them so much that I’ll wear them for leisure too. I got 3 pairs bc they have to be line dried and in the winter it takes about a day and a half to fully dry indoors. (Plus they’re very comfy) I do heavy work and these don’t tear and have lots of reinforcements. The extra belt loops keep belt in place when crouching and lifting. It’s the best fitting and most flattering pants I’ve found. Thank you
Heavy duty rugged pants. This is our 2nd pair for working on a cattle farm

评论概述: Great style, great material, weird and erratic sizing
评论详情: I wanted to try a Carhartt alternative and decided to order Dovetail. I'm a size 8 or 10 depending on brand and cut, so I ordered two pairs: 8x30 and 10x30, and Amazon also accidentally sent a 10x28. The 8x30 pair was larger than both of the size 10s! Look at my photos to see the sizing difference in the waist when laid end to end. The 8x30 was about an inch larger in the waist than the 10x28, and 2 inches larger than the 10x30. Since both size 10 pairs were smaller than the size 8 pair, I assume this is a chronic issue. Consider ordering both up AND down a size to account for their weird inconsistencies. Otherwise, I love my new pants, I like the added stretch in the heavy duty fabric, the placement of pockets, etc.

I have been looking for a pair of double layer knee, blue denim pants for a while. I have an old pair of Carhartt's that are on their last legs (literally and figuratively). Carhartt does not make this style anymore in blue denim, so I was very glad to find that Dovetail does.  I can't say enough good things about these pants. I look forward to doing years of Firewising and forestry work in them.

评论概述: Order up a size to compensate lack of stretch, excellent quality
评论详情: I am typically a 25, but ordered the 27 after reading about lack of stretch in the canvas and the fit is perfect; fits well with enough room to move and have a thin base layer in cold weather. Excellent quality.
Runs small, order up and that pair was like trying on the first pair.

评论概述: Most comfortable and relevant work pant for women.
评论详情: My only desire, would be that Dovetail offer a knee pad for the pants

Each wash and dryer cycle they shrink. I loved them and first and still like them but if I purchased again I would make sure to compensate for the shrinkage or line dry them - which really isn't convenient. I accidentally bout a regular and a long. I prefer the longer pair but the regular pair are still ok with work boots.

Extremely durable, I’m a welder for a mining company and let me tell you torching all day, sitting on my butt in the mud, no holes or burns. I torched next to my leg for almost 3 hours and my leg was getting burnt from how hot the pants got BUT IT DIDNT BURN THE PANTS AT ALL. there the best pants I ever got I should have gotten a size smaller because I like my jeans super tight but they still fit good for someone that likes there jeans more relaxed

I loved the fit and the ample amount of pockets. I hate that it looked like I already been wearing it to work for a year! Wth! I needed these pants! 100 on used pants! They were dirty, ripped and burned. Someone needs to be fired.

评论概述: Low rise not good for working
评论详情: Was excited about these but they are too low rise. Back of pants sticks out. Hate that. Sending them back. Wish they were mid-high rise for protection.

These are really worth the purchase. They are nice and thick perfect for working outside. The length was just right for me ( I'm 4'11 so finding the right length is always an issue for me)but these were perfect for me. The waist was a little too loose for me. I jist wish they had a size smaller, but I am very happy with these pants and would highly recommend.

Overall the quality is very good. It’s thick and has lots of pockets. The only reason why I had to return was because the pants were too wide from the legs. I thought they were more boot cut/skinny Jean type.

评论概述: Best work pants on the market.
评论详情: The fit is smaller than the insulated version of the same pant I purchased in the winter. This canvas isn’t as comfortable as the insulated version, but still worth the money.

评论概述: Liked the pants. Too tight in my waist but fit everywhere else.
评论详情: Liked the pants. Too tight on my tummy.

评论概述: Awesome quality and so many pockets!
评论详情: I'm 5'2"/120lbs. I got size 6/32 which lets them stack a bit. The fit is a bit on the relaxed side which is good for work pants. The denim is a nice grade and look at the features! The coin/watch pocket is knuckle deep. My hand fit the regular front pocket above the wrist. The hem in the back is double layered. There are three back pockets. The knee area is reinforced. There is a hammer loop. Considering the price and the quality and features, theses jeans are worth it. I'm glad my husband ordered two for my birthday!
I'm 5'10" and 175lbs. It fits perfectly.
These are great. They just run small and too short for me. Re ordered a different size and length.

评论概述: Very happy well made denim work jeans.
评论详情: Just enough stretch. Heavy duty denim. Pockets everywhere for tools. Fits well. Not too tight. Glad they come in different lengths.

评论概述: Best work/outdoor pants I've ever purchased.
评论详情: Love the rugged material and pockets. Comfortable and reliable.

Hands down best work pant ever. I’m a heavy equipment operator and in and out of equipment all day. Pants have stretch. So they are a little snug at first but then relax out with perfect stretch. Very durable!! I won’t buy any other jeans for work. I’m 5’6” and 150lbs. I am athletic build so my booty and thighs are thick.

I really like the way they are made and have retuned them for a larger size. I can’t wait to see how the bigger size will fit. I’m normally a size 7 in women’s pants but the 8 was a little tight on my tummy.. I have gained a little weight being home... lol

评论概述: Great pants— some length issues though
评论详情: For starters: I like my pants a little looser. Typically I wear men’s pants, but I decided to try these out since the material actually looked (and reviews stated) durable. I love these! They’re probably the best brand that I’ve ever owned in regards to workwear.  The only downside is the length consistency. I have three pairs now and the first 28l I got are perfect; when I hike them up really high they’re even a little short. These jeans I ordered 28l as well, but they’re longer than my other pair so they drag on the ground depending on which boots I’m wearing (which isn’t the best for Washington state weather).  I chalked it up to ‘not everyone is perfect’ and decided to keep them. It’d be ideal to have the length they’re supposed to be, but they’re still awesome work pants.

5'7"/160# A little thick through the middle and i have no butt..BEST FITTING PANTS EVER. I ordered 8/34 which keeps them from stretching out after being worn,even so there is not so much stretch that they sag in the butt or thighs. i also have a pair in 10/34 still a great fit and little shrinkage.

评论概述: Good fit, thick canvas fabric. Measure yourself before you buy!
评论详情: I am so glad I got these! I'm not really curvy and even though they're more loose than the maven style, they're so comfortable. I ordered a size 4 x 34 inseam and the length is perfect. I don't think I'll need a belt for them. Waiting to work cattle to see how they hold up!
I love them

I really wanted these pants to fit, but they just didn’t. I’m 5’5” and 130lbs with a slender/athletic frame and a muscular rear. I ordered a 6/32, as I usually wear size 6 pants. There wasn’t as much stretch to the material as I was hoping and they didn’t feel like they were worth $80. Once I put them on, I had mixed feelings. They fit my legs fine, length-wise and width-wise. But the waist was loose by a good 3” in the back, the seam on the butt went up my crack and gave me a wedgie, and the crotch was oddly too big. When I bent over, the pants cut off my stomach area (I have a flat stomach) and didn’t move with my body. They fit like men’s pants, which is exactly what I was trying to avoid. If I had gone up a size to fit my butt, they would’ve been way too loose around my waist and crotch. Just an overall awkward fit on my figure.

评论概述: Hot, little to no give. Okay fit.
评论详情: I am 5’4 and weigh 163 pounds. I am very curvy and have large hips and thighs. I read all the reviews on sizing and ordered a 14 regular. I usually wear a 6 or an 8. The fit was surprisingly okay except they were a little shorter than I would have hoped but overall not bad. I was really excited to wear them for work. I’m a public insurance adjuster and needed heavy duty pants to inspect roofs in the heat. But let me tell you I was soooo dumb for buying these for a roof. They are hot. Hotttt. There is little to no give especially when you get sweaty so moving around and bending and squatting is nearly impossible. Florida heat is no joke. The rise is high so you get all sweaty by your stomach too and canvas makes you chafed. I will definitely be buying a belt and not ever wearing them on a roof inspection. I definitely thought these would have more give so I could move around comfortably. I’ll stick to wearing these on indoor inspections and plumbing losses.
As expected

I love these pants for work! Finally a utility pant that fit my body! Carharts are great but don’t fit my body. I love these. The overall are my absolute favorite. If you don’t have the tiny waste to big booty ratio these are better than carharts

评论概述: Plus up your size if you need extra movement.
评论详情: Bought these for my girlfriend that works on WWII airplanes.  Ordered an 8x30 according to her measurements.  They fit well if they were intended to be regular pants, but were too tight and not as long as she likes for all of the squatting and crawling in tight spaces involved in her job.  This is where the whole process got really painful!  I returned those and ordered a size 10x32.  I was sent a 12x28! Those were then returned and I received a 10x34! So frustrated.  Who's packing these things?!?Needless to say she kept this size because she was afraid of what we'd get next.  She just gives the cuffs a couple rolls.  Otherwise she's excited about these pants and I hope that for all the trouble they were that they work out well.

Very heavy duty denim and feels like it would wear well over time.  I work outside with wildlife and need rugged pants that can stand some abuse.  These do run small.  I'm 5'6" and 145lbs and normally wear a size 6 to an 8 in pants. I sized up one size to a 10 based on the reviews and I'm glad I did as these run small in the waist and don't have a ton of give.  These are also made to be worn at your natural waist which I like because it guarantees no plumbers crack when I'm bending over. Overall I like them - they're not fashion jeans and won't fit like fashion jeans.  As work pants they will do very well!

I HIGHLY recommend these jeans. Good workable pockets, very comfortable for jeans, sturdy and well built. Made by american company, they do some outsourcing to mexico. These are my favorite jeans definitely will buy again!

评论概述: Snug fit but comfortable and durable
评论详情: These fit pretty well, but were a bit tight when I first put them on. They are a bit snug around the waist and a little higher than some of my other pants. I do think they look good and feel fairly comfortable, so I'm happy. I normally wear a size 6 and bought a 6. I think the 8 would've been too big. I'm about 5'4" ish and around 130lbs.
Fit just right, leaving enough room were it isnt unconfotably tight. Great for my job, welding. Would definitely buy again.

评论概述: Perfect pant in more ways than one
评论详情: I love this pant!!! They fit perfectly and I will definitely order more. They are sturdy and have a feminine stylish fit. I love the contrast stitching too.

评论概述: No stretch, low rise, loose waist but tight in thighs
评论详情: Not good for small waist/large thighs or butt. Little to no stretch through thighs, which was strange because I have the black dovetail overalls and they’re super comfy and stretchy. This canvas material is super uncomfortable (in my opinion). Waist band too large, pants were slipping down.  If you’re built taller and leaner maybe they’d work, and if you don’t mind zero stretch.
great pants but the ad on amazon was incorrect. since then it seems they have changed format. i ordered 0 but received a 30" inseam instead of 32". otherwise will ALWAYS recommend DOVETAIL WORKWEAR
